name: Discover (TeamDungeon)
description:
Discover is a peaceful sandbox game where you can run around your plot of land shaping the land and its inhabitants how you see fit.

This game was made in 30 hours and will have updates down the road.

Windows:
To see your screenshots go to %localappdata% and find the folder called 'DISCOVER'.

Mac: 
Finder -> Go (Hold down Alt to reveal Library) Then Application Support
Then com.teamdungeons.discover

Discoveries

These are all the discoveries you can place in your plot as of the current alpha version.

 

Controls

Left Click to interact.
Right Click to remove objects.

Future Updates

Future updates there will be

  • A randomly generated map to explore
  • goblins and other enemies trying to stop you from exploring
  • ways to obtain discoveries
  • better plot tools like a brush to paint objects
  • more sound effects and animations.
